General.Name: Selangor Dredging Bhd
General.Description: Selangor Dredging Berhad, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the property development business in Malaysia and Singapore. The company operates through Property Investment, Hotel Operations, Property Development, and Others segments. It is also involved in the letting of commercial properties; operation of Hotel Maya Kuala Lumpur, a boutique urban resort hotel; trading, installation, and franchisee of energy efficient products; and provision of property management and support services. The company was incorporated in 1962 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
